column4: Hi, can anyone give me hand in changing the refresh rate on my new installed ubuntu?
The only thing I can select is 60Hz
basically what you'll need to do is edit /etc/X11/XF86Config-4 (or xorg.conf if in Hoary), the Monitor section, so that it spesifies your monitors capabilities
namely, you'll want to spesify HorizSync and VertRefresh ranges, which you can get from your monitor manual
